section.name: What is jrepo
section.p: jrepo is not a single product, application or server. It's a set of packages which include a framework of content management system, several implementation of it like file system implementation and database implementation, and presentation application for web users.
The goal of jrepo projects is providing a content management system solution which is separated into API for pure Java applications and application for presentation by a proposed jrepo standard.
Here's a list of jrepo projects

tr.td: jrepo content management system standard API. A package of interfaces and some basic implementations.
File system implementation of jrepo standard. It store contents with file system folders and files in XML.
Database implementation powered Apache Torque project.
JDO implmentaton of jrepo standard. It could be hard since most of JDO implementations are not mature enough. At this moment, torquerepo could be more pratical.

Web application to present jrepo system. The application won't be a fancy web application. Instead, it'll just simply provide the ability to use a jrepo system on web. Further polish will be implemented by a portal system which is another project only exists in my mind.
